robots.txt: # Lines here will be added to the global robots.txt
gettingstarted-task-toolbar-no-suggested: Sorry. We couldn't find more articles to be improved at the moment. Try again in a moment or search for your own topics of interest.
gettingstarted-task-copyedit-toolbar-des: This article may have spelling or grammar errors you can fix.
gettingstarted-task-copyedit-toolbar-try: Go to a random article you can improve by copyediting
guidedtour-tour-gettingstartedtasktoolba: This article is identified by other {{SITENAME}} users as needing improvement. You don't have to be an expert in the subject to help.
These banners identify problems with this article. You don't need to fix them all, just stick with what you're comfortable doing.
Click "$1" to change content anywhere in the article.
You can now edit the article contents. When you are done, click "{{int:publishchanges}}" to review and save your changes.
guidedtour-tour-gettingstarted-click-pre: Clicking "{{int:showpreview}}" allows you to see what the article will look like with your changes. Just don't forget to save.
search-interwiki-custom:
wikt:From Wiktionary
b:From Wikibooks
n:From Wikinews
q:From Wikiquote
s:From Wikisource
v:From Wikiversity
voy:From Wikivoyage
wikidata-copyright: All structured data from the main, Property, Lexeme, and EntitySchema namespaces is available under the Creative Commons CC0 License; text in the other namespaces is available under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike License; additional terms may apply. By using this site, you agree to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
wikimedia-copyrightwarning:
By saving changes, you agree to the [https://foundation.wikimedia.org/wiki/Terms_of_Use Terms of Use], and you irrevocably agree to release your contribution under the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Text_of_Creative_Commons_Attribution-ShareAlike_3.0_Unported_License CC BY-SA 3.0 License] and the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Text_of_the_GNU_Free_Documentation_License GFDL].
You agree that a hyperlink or URL is sufficient attribution under the Creative Commons license.
wikimedia-mobile-license-links: CC BY-SA 3.0 and GFDL
cant-delete-main-page: You cannot delete or move the main page.
wikimedia-translationnotifications-signu: You agree that by providing the Wikimedia Foundation with this information we may contact you regarding translations or other topics related to the Wikimedia movement we think may be of interest to you. You agree your data may be stored in the United States of America and is subject to our [https://foundation.wikimedia.org/wiki/Privacy_policy privacy policy].
upload-more-photos-of-this-monument: Upload more photos of this monument
wikimedia-globalblocking-ipblocked:
'''Your IP address has been [[m:Special:MyLanguage/Global blocks|blocked on all wikis]].'''

The block was made by $1 ($2).
The reason given is ''$3''.

* Start of block: $4
* Expiry of block: $5

Your current IP address is $6.
Please include all above details in any queries you make.

If you believe you were blocked by mistake, you can find additional information and instructions in the [[m:Special:MyLanguage/No open proxies|No open proxies]] global policy.
Otherwise, to discuss the block please [[m:Steward requests/Global|post a request for review on Meta-Wiki]].
wikimedia-globalblocking-ipblocked-range:
'''Your IP address is in a range that has been [[m:Special:MyLanguage/Global blocks|blocked on all Wikimedia Foundation wikis]].'''

The block was made by $1 ($2).
The reason given is ''$3''.

* Start of block: $4
* Expiry of block: $5

Your current IP address is $6 and the blocked range is $7.
Please include all above details in any queries you make.

If you believe you were blocked by mistake, you can find additional information and instructions in the [[m:Special:MyLanguage/No open proxies|No open proxies]] global policy.
Otherwise, to discuss the block please [[m:Steward requests/Global|post a request for review on Meta-Wiki]] or send an email to the [[m:Special:MyLanguage/Stewards|stewards]] [[m:Special:MyLanguage/OTRS|OTRS]] queue at <kbd>stewards@wikimedia.org</kbd> including all above details.
wikimedia-globalblocking-ipblocked-xff:
'''One or more proxy servers used by your request is [[m:Special:MyLanguage/Global blocks|globally blocked]].'''

The block was made by $1 ($2).
The reason given is ''$3''.

* Start of block: $4
* Expiry of block: $5

The blocked proxy address was $6.
Please include all above details in any queries you make.

If you believe you were blocked by mistake, you can find additional information and instructions in the [[m:Special:MyLanguage/No open proxies|No open proxies]] global policy.
Otherwise, to discuss the block please [[m:Steward requests/Global|post a request for review on Meta-Wiki]].
wikimedia-torblock-blocked: Your IP address, $1, has been automatically identified as a Tor exit node. Editing through Tor is blocked to prevent abuse. For additional information and instructions to legitimate users, see the [[m:Special:MyLanguage/No open proxies|No open proxies]] global policy.
upload-form-label-own-work-message-commo: I attest that I own the copyright on this file, and agree to irrevocably release this file to Wikimedia Commons under the [https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/ Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0] license, and I agree to the [https://foundation.wikimedia.org/wiki/Terms_of_Use Terms of Use].
upload-form-label-not-own-work-message-c: If you do not own the copyright on this file, or you wish to release it under a different license, consider using the [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:UploadWizard Commons Upload Wizard].
upload-form-label-not-own-work-local-com: You may also want to try using [[Special:Upload|the upload page on {{SITENAME}}]], if the site allows the upload of this file under their policies.
wikimedia-upload-nolicenses: Uploading files to this wiki is not enabled. Please [[commons:Special:UploadWizard|upload to Wikimedia Commons]]. To be able to use this special page to upload to this wiki, an administrator needs to add one or more license options to the page [[MediaWiki:Licenses]]. Use the following format: * Template name|Label. Use any text to enable uploading without license options.
protect-level-templateeditor: Allow only template editors and administrators
protect-level-extendedconfirmed: Allow only established editors and administrators
action-banner-protect: protect translatable messages handled by the Translate extension and included in CentralNotice banners
right-banner-protect: Protect translatable messages handled by the Translate extension and included in CentralNotice banners
protect-level-banner-protect: Allow translation administrators and central notice administrators
restriction-level-banner-protect: translation administrator and central notice administrator protected
eri-rcfilters-tour-intro-welcome-title: Welcome to improved Recent Changes filtering
eri-rcfilters-tour-intro-welcome-descrip: Review edits more efficiently using new filters, the ability to save sets of filters, user-defined highlighting and the power of machine learning. $1
eri-rcfilters-tour-intro-welcome-no-ores: Review edits more efficiently using new filters, the ability to save sets of filters, user-defined highlighting and other improvements. $1
eri-rcfilters-tour-intro-preferences-des: Access the Recent Changes tab in preferences any time to opt out of the improved version of Recent Changes.
eri-rcfilters-tour-highlight-description:
Use highlighting to visually distinguish selected properties.

You can combine highlights with filters or use highlighting independently.
eri-rcfilters-tour-confirm-title: The new filters are enabled now
eri-rcfilters-tour-confirm-description: You can access the beta features page to provide feedback or disable the feature.
eri-wlfilters-tour-intro-preferences-des: Access the Watchlist tab in preferences any time to opt out of the improved Watchlist.
wikimedia-centralauth-contribs-locked:
This account is globally locked.
See [[m:Special:CentralAuth/$1|global account details]] for more information.
action-viewdeletedfile: view files and pages in the {{ns:file}} and {{ns:file_talk}} namespaces that are deleted
right-viewdeletedfile: View files and pages in the {{ns:file}} and {{ns:file_talk}} namespaces that are deleted
ext-quicksurveys-performance-internal-su: Did this page load fast enough?
For more information, see this survey's [https://foundation.wikimedia.org/wiki/Performance_Perception_Survey_Privacy_Statement privacy statement].
ext-quicksurveys-growth-external-survey-: We are looking to learn from our users and how we can best support your experiences on Wikipedia. Please fill out a short screener survey and we may invite you to chat with us about your experiences. Thank you in advance for your interest and for visiting Wikipedia!
From the Wikimedia User Research team. For more information, see this survey's [https://docs.google.com/document/d/1l4nsMqXsjQwKuGMmX19DM4Ho_17tY9v82YCbVme7XOU privacy statement].
wikimedia-switchover-read-only: You can't edit now. This is because of maintenance. Copy and save your text and try again in a few minutes.
passwordpolicies-policy-blockattacker: Password policy for mitigation of known attacks where disclosure of details would impede the mitigation
technical-maintenance-soon: Technical maintenance will be performed soon:
technical-maintenance-edit: During this time you might not be able to save any edits.
querypage-updates-half-monthly: Updates for this page are running twice a month.
querypage-updates-monthly: Updates for this page are running once a month.
